name: Charge Arena
description:
Enter the Arena and survive as long as possible! 

The more energy you have, the more powerful your spaceship is... but be careful!
If you are the most charged player, when the Death Countdown reaches zero, you'll be destroyed!

Action time-trial game by Paco Juan (Twitter: @_thisIsPJ).
Controls: Move: direction keys || Shoot: space / A / RB
Gamepad allowed.
